com.madara.googlecode.testing
Class SimpleOperations

java.lang.Object
  com.madara.googlecode.testing.SimpleOperations

public class SimpleOperations
extends java.lang.Object

Conducts series of tests to guage performance of Java. SimpleOperations class uses the high resolution timer available via System.nanoTime () to gauge the performance of reinforcements (i.e. ++j) and guarded reinforcements (i.e. guard => ++j) in Java.

Author:
James Edmondson
